languages.text: "Ты опоздал{mf||а}, {name}, твои союзники пали. Не желаешь ли сдаться в плен? Обещаю, что... Нет, ничего не обещаю. Ты все равно умрешь медленно и в мучениях".

"You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."
languages.original_text: "Ты опоздал{mf||а}, {name}, твои союзники пали. Не желаешь ли сдаться в плен? Обещаю, что... Нет, ничего не обещаю. Ты все равно умрешь медленно и в мучениях".

traits.locale_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will choose a slow and excruciating death."
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

traits.locale_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: “你来晚了，{name}，你的盟友已经死了。或许，你也该承认你的失败了吧？如果你愿意承认的话，我保证……不，我什么都不会保证。无论你怎么做，你都会在缓慢而痛苦的死亡中一命呜呼。”
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: “你来晚了，{name}，你的盟友已经死了。或许，你也该承认你的失败了吧？如果你愿意承认的话，我保证……不，我什么都不会保证。无论你怎么做，你都会在缓慢而痛苦的死亡中一命呜呼。”
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: « Vous êtes en retard, {name}. Vos alliés sont tombés. Ne serait-il pas temps d'admettre votre défaite ? Si vous le faites, je promets de... Non, je ne promets rien du tout. Quoi que vous décidiez, votre mort sera lente et affreusement douloureuse. »
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes en retard, {name}. Vos alliés sont tombés. Ne serait-il pas temps d'admettre votre défaite ? Si vous le faites, je promets de... Non, je ne promets rien du tout. Quoi que vous décidiez, votre mort sera lente et affreusement douloureuse. »
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: 「遅いぞ、{name}。味方は倒れた。そろそろ負けを認めたらどうだ？もし降伏するなら、約束…いや、貴様とは何も約束しない。何を選ぼうと、ゆっくりと耐え難い死を与えてやろう」
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: 「遅いぞ、{name}。味方は倒れた。そろそろ負けを認めたらどうだ？もし降伏するなら、約束…いや、貴様とは何も約束しない。何を選ぼうと、ゆっくりと耐え難い死を与えてやろう」
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: «Llegas tarde, {name}. Tus aliados han caído. ¿No va siendo hora de que admitas la derrota? Si lo haces, prometo... no, no prometo nada. Elijas lo que elijas, te espera una muerte lenta y dolorosa».
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: «Llegas tarde, {name}. Tus aliados han caído. ¿No va siendo hora de que admitas la derrota? Si lo haces, prometo... no, no prometo nada. Elijas lo que elijas, te espera una muerte lenta y dolorosa».
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "Ihr kommt zu spät, {name}. Eure Verbündeten sind bereits gefallen. Vielleicht ist es an der Zeit, Eure Niederlage einzugestehen? Wenn Ihr das tut, dann verspreche ich ... nein, ich verspreche überhaupt nichts. Wie Ihr Euch auch entscheidet, Ihr werdet einen langsamen, qualvollen Tod sterben."
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr kommt zu spät, {name}. Eure Verbündeten sind bereits gefallen. Vielleicht ist es an der Zeit, Eure Niederlage einzugestehen? Wenn Ihr das tut, dann verspreche ich ... nein, ich verspreche überhaupt nichts. Wie Ihr Euch auch entscheidet, Ihr werdet einen langsamen, qualvollen Tod sterben."
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "Geç kaldın {name}. Müttefiklerin yitip gitti. Yenilgini kabullenmenin zamanı gelmedi mi? Kabullenirsen sana sözüm olsun... Hayır, sana hiçbir şey vadetmeyeceğim. Kararın ne olursa olsun acı içinde kıvrandığın, ağır bir ölümü kucaklayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "You are late, {name}. Your allies have fallen. Perhaps it's time to admit your defeat? If you do, I promise... no, I won't promise you anything. Whatever you choose, you will die a slow and excruciating death."
